contentrichtext.text: {{Indianfilmlist}} A list of films produced in the [[Telugu cinema]] or [[Cinema of Andhra Pradesh|Tollywood]] industry and in the [[Telugu language]]. Pages are split by decade of release. ==1930s== * [[Telugu films of the 1930s]] ==1940s== * [[Telugu films of the 1940s]] ==1950s== * [[Telugu films of the 1950s]] ==1960s== * [[Telugu films of the 1960s]] * [[Telugu films of 1961]] * [[Telugu films of 1962]] * [[Telugu films of 1963]] * [[Telugu films of 1964]] * [[Telugu films of 1965]] ==1970s== * [[Telugu films of the 1970s]] ==1980s== * [[Telugu films of the 1980s]] ==1990s== * [[Telugu films of the 1990s]] ==2000s== * [[Telugu films of 2000]] * [[Telugu films of 2001]] * [[Telugu films of 2002]] * [[Telugu films of 2003]] * [[Telugu films of 2004]] * [[Telugu films of 2005]] * [[Telugu films of 2006]] * [[Telugu films of 2007]] * [[Telugu films of 2008]] * [[Telugu films of 2009]] ==2010s== * [[Telugu films of 2010]] * [[Telugu films of 2011]] * [[Telugu films of 2012]] {{Tollywood}} {{CinemaofIndia}} {{Filmsbycountry}} __NOTOC_thujy ghjhj_ [[Category:Cinema of Andhra Pradesh|*]] [[Category:Telugu-language films|*]] [[Category:Lists of Indian films]] [[Category:Lists of films by language|Telugu]]
